about_the_game:
Once, there was a king, and it was a golden time.
However, the kingdom was invaded by darkness; the dark lord desired to seize the entire kingdom for himself.
Nevertheless, the king still had his best knights who fought for the kingdom.
Eventually, the kingdom fell, and a dark age ensued.
There was nothing to eat, no joy, until finally, the hero raised his sword...

This set includes extensive assets ideal for crafting a medieval narrative.
It offers various scenes such as castles, villages, landscapes, basic interiors, battlefields, prisons, settlements, and ruins.
Each element is presented in multiple styles including normal, blue tone, calm, chromo, vintage 1-5, old colors, and various winter themes.
These elements can be combined to create diverse and visually appealing environments!

Contents

ANIMATIONS: 271x

Trees
Fire
Torches
FlagsV1
FlagsV2
FlagsV3
Flags have animation from left to right and right to left,

Characters-Knights.
All animations have the same styles as tilesets plus winter style.

PARALLAXES: 6x
Cloud
Snow

TILESETS: 185x

In the Tileset folder, you will find A1, A2, A4, B, C, D, and E (185X). These tilesets contain a wide variety of styles, including Normal, Blue Tone, Calm, Chromo, Vintage1-5, and Old Colors. Additionally, all of these styles are available in winter designs.

-----

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
